name: Venetian Spritz
description: In its glory days, Venice sent out its fearsome fleet to conquer international trade. Today, a gentler envoy has conquered international cocktail menus: the spritz. The fizzy aperitif is made with a choice of Aperol, Campari or Cynar along with white wine and sparkling mineral water.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces Aperol or other bitter aperitif

recipeInstructions.text: Gently stir all liquid ingredients over ice in a tumbler and add olive.
